00014 // .NAME vtkMrmlTetraMeshNode - MRML node for representing a TetraMesh.
00015 // .SECTION Description
00016 // TetraMesh nodes describe data sets that can be thought of as stacks of 2D 
00017 // images that form a 3D TetraMesh.  TetraMesh nodes describe where the images 
00018 // are stored on disk, how to render the data (window and level), and how 
00019 // to read the files.  This information is extracted from the image 
00020 // headers (if they exist) at the time the MRML file is generated.  
00021 // Consequently, MRML files isolate MRML browsers from understanding how 
00022 // to read the myriad of file formats for medical data. 
00023 
00024 #ifndef __vtkMrmlTetraMeshNode_h
00025 #define __vtkMrmlTetraMeshNode_h
